author: vinnie87
body:
Bug fixes and new features:
Bug Fix:
- Export indent errors
- log message errors
  New features:
- Search field for all the items
- clipboard (select and copy) on the prescales tab
- smart prescale column on summary view
- text field and text area for parameters value
- smart prescale view for smart prescale expressions in end path
title: confdb candidate release v1.2.4
